search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4401_0: The ocean here is so beautiful!
It sure reminds me of Alola!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4402_0:
When it rains on Exeggutor Island in Alola,
rainbows appear during the day.

And at night, you can see meteor showers...or so
the rumors say. How captivating!
Yeah! It’s a really cool place!

I’d love to see a meteor shower here on
Pasio, too!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4403_0:
The chill feels so nice on my skin after a
good battle!
It’s just like we’re back in Alola!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4404_0:
If I keep on paddling, I might just make it to Alola
for some battling!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4406_0:
Whoa, it’s all lit up, like the meteor showers back
in Alola! It’s so pretty!
Thanks to you, we got to see a lot of Pasio!
The world is so vast and full of wonderful places!

I hope we can keep on exploring together to find
them all!

Yeah! Oh, but before that, we should also have
some Pokémon battles!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4407_0:
Different Meowth have different personalities, so
watch out!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4408_0: Haha! Look, it’s having a little afternoon nap!
Let’s see if we can sneak up and catch it!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4409_0: There, there. Nothing to be scared of!

I have a Meowth back home, so I’m used to
handling them.
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4410_0:
What a cute voice! This is definitely a quiet,
mellow one.
Ack! Or maybe not! Quick, let’s catch it!
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4411_0:
OK, looks like we finally got everyone in
one place.
search_general_talk_yo_mizuki_sub/4412_0:
Hey. Sorry ’bout that. I’m not used to Meowth that
aren’t from Alola.

And yeah, I guess I should thank you properly for
lending me a hand with all that.

How about this? Would you like to try raising
one of my Meowth?

One’s asleep, so it’ll have to be one of these two.
Which do you want?

Hmm... If you can’t really tell the difference
between their personalities, you might run into
some issues raising them.

Maybe I’ll wait on handing one of them off to you
for now.

Y-yeah, it’s tough to tell at first what kind of
personality they have.

Let’s study together so you can tell the difference
next time!
